Healthy Meals Diet Assistant
  • Programmers Guide
  • Nox automation
  • View page source

Nox automationÔÉÅ

We chose to use Nox seems to be the defacto automation tool, especially for python testing.

nox is the automation tool we use generate or update the documentation that will eventually produce HTML documentation in the docs/build folder. See our nox guide about our use of nox in healthy-meals. We use the github pages style of docstrings for the documentation of healthy-meals.

Instructions: to run a nox automation function listed below, the format of the command is:

nox -s <noxCommand>

Note: any functions descriptions that have a trailing >:(, indicates the functions need repair since the PDM install

* localUp -> Bring up Healthy Meals in local server.
* genNoxDocs -> Generate nox documentation into a file for inclusion into Sphinx.
* sphinxDocs -> Rebuild all documentation to Sphinx (cleans up old docs).
* testing -> Run automated tests (with test coverage) through docker.
* dockerUpBg -> Bring up Healthy Meals in docker in background. >:(
* dockerUpLog -> Bring up Healthy Meals in docker, with log to console. >:(
* dockerEnsureUp -> to Only bring up Healthy Meals in docker if not up already. >:(
* dockerExecSh -> to Open shell in web container. >:(
* dockerExecPsql -> to Open psql in db container. >:(
* dockerDown -> to Bring down Healthy Meals in docker. >:(
* dockerClear -> to Clear out entire docker system. >:(
* dockerMakeDocs -> to Generate the documentation using Sphinx through docker. >:(
* dockerRemakeDocs -> to Regenerate the documentation using Sphinx through docker (cleans up old docs). >:(
* dockerLogs -> to Output docker logs out to console. (hit <ctrl>c to stop). >:(
* dockerTesting -> to Run automated tests (localtest) through docker. >:(
* mypy -> to run the mypy type checker >:(
* ruff -> to run the ruff code standards tool >:(
* flake8 -> to run the flake8 code standards tool >:(
* djlint -> to run the djlint code standards tool >:(
* pylint -> to run the pylint code standards tool >:(

sessions marked with * are selected, sessions marked with - are skipped.
